name: Prodigy the Game
blurb: Prodigy is a tactical RPG with figurines, a new way to play that we will create with you. Thank you so much for your support!

rewards.reward: No Reward

THANK YOU PACK ============================== Select this option if you wish to support the project and receive a big thank you from the team - every dollar helps!\r\n(this reward cannot include add-ons)

ART PACK - Artbook + OST\r\n==============================\r\nChoose your Faction and receive the corresponding digital artbook, as well as the digital soundtrack (this reward is purely digital and cannot include physical add-ons).

A LA CARTE PACK - Add-ons only ============================== Select this option if you wish to get add-ons only. Initial pledge covers shipping costs to US. Simply increase your pledge according to the value of the items you wish to get - the end of project survey will allow you to select your rewards. Please add $10 for international shipping.

TROPHY PACK - Artbook + OST + Warbeast ============================== Choose your Faction and receive an ART PACK, as well as the War Trophy Warbeast in its Kickstarter exclusive paint (this reward has exclusive shipping costs and cannot include physical add-ons). Please add $7 for US shipping, $10 for international shipping.

DELUXE ART PACK - Deluxe artbook + OST\r\n==============================\r\nReceive the digital deluxe artbook covering both Factions with exclusive content, as well as the digital soundtrack (this reward is purely digital and cannot include physical add-ons).

EARLY THORNS PACK - 1 starter set + the game
==============================
Early bird! Receive the Company of Thorns. Includes game pack, starter set of Company of Thorns figurines and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.

EARLY STORM PACK - 1 starter set + the game
==============================
Early bird! Receive the Company of the Storm. Includes game pack, starter set of Company of the Storm figurines and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.

KICKSTARTER PACK - 1 starter set + the game
==============================
Choose the Company of Thorns or the Company of the Storm. Includes game pack, starter figurine set of your choice and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.

DELUXE PACK - 1 starter set + the game +  deluxe items
==============================
Choose the Company of Thorns or the Company of the Storm. Includes game pack, starter figurine set of your choice, deluxe artbook, OST, T-shirt and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.

COMPANION TO MANY PACK - 2 starter sets + the game
==============================
Includes game pack, 2 different starter figurine sets (6 figurines) and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.

COMPANY PACK - 1 full Company + the game
==============================
Choose the Company of Thorns or the Company of the Storm. Includes game pack, full Company of your choice (6 figurines), digital artbook of your choice, digital OST and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.

DUO STARTER PACK - 2 starter sets + 2 games ============================== Receive two KICKSTARTER PACKS (one for each Company) for the shipping cost of one. Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.

BETA PACK - 1 full Company + beta game
==============================
Choose the Company of Thorns or the Company of the Storm. Receive a COMPANY PACK and beta access to the game.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.

DELUXE COMPANY PACK - 1 full Company + beta game + deluxe items
==============================
Choose the Company of Thorns or the Company of the Storm. Receive a COMPANY PACK, beta access to the game, deluxe artbook, OST and T-shirt.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.

JACK OF ALL TRADES PACK - 2 full Companies + additional figurines + beta game
==============================
Includes game pack with beta access to the game, 2 different full companies, 1 Ally and 1 Henchman (14 figurines), 2 different digital artbooks and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $30 for US shipping, $40 for international shipping.

EARLY ALPHA FOUNDER - 1 full Company + alpha game + beta game + deluxe items
==============================
Early bird! Receive an ALPHA FOUNDER PACK.
Free shipping!

ALPHA FOUNDER PACK - 1 full Company + alpha game + beta game + deluxe items ============================== Choose the Company of Thorns or the Company of the Storm. Receive a COMPANY PACK, deluxe artbook, soundtrack, and exclusive Alpha Founder T-shirt. Receive alpha and beta access to the game, and an Ally or Henchman figurine depending on the Faction you chose to represent.\r\nFree shipping.

SEVENTEEN PACK - 2 full Companies + additional figurines + beta game + deluxe items
==============================
Receive a JACK OF ALL TRADES pack, as well as 1 Legend and 2 Boss figurines (all 17 first figurines of the game), beta access to the game, deluxe artbook, soundtrack, T-shirt and Kickstarter exclusive visual effects.
Free shipping.

EARLY SEVENTEEN FOUNDER PACK - 2 full Companies + additional figurines + alpha game + beta game + deluxe items
==============================
BEST VALUE. Early bird! Receive a SEVENTEEN FOUNDER PACK.
Free shipping.

STILL QUITE EARLY SEVENTEEN FOUNDER PACK - 2 full Companies + additional figurines + alpha game + beta game + deluxe items ============================== BEST VALUE. Early bird! Receive a SEVENTEEN FOUNDER PACK. Free shipping.

SEVENTEEN FOUNDER PACK - 2 full Companies + additional figurines + alpha game + beta game + deluxe items
==============================
Receive a SEVENTEEN PACK, as well as alpha and beta access.
Free shipping.

ULTIMATE COLLECTOR PACK - 2 full Companies + additional figurines + alpha game + beta game + deluxe items + collector statuette
==============================
Receive a SEVENTEEN FOUNDER PACK, as well as a 20cm limited edition statuette of Soha cast in white resin and delivered with its numbered and signed certificate of authenticity.
Free shipping.

POWER PACK - 2 full Companies + additional figurines + alpha game + beta game + deluxe items + collector statuette + design your own symbol of power
==============================
Receive an ULTIMATE COLLECTOR PACK, and design and create your own symbol of power with the team.
Free shipping.

CREATOR PACK - 2 full Companies + additional figurines + alpha game + beta game + deluxe items + collector statuette + design your own Symbol of Power + design your own character
==============================
Receive a POWER PACK, and design and create your own character and its figurine with the team - and have it included in the game!
Free shipping.

CHOSEN ONE PACK - 2 full Companies + additional figurines + alpha game  + beta game + deluxe items + collector statuette + design your own Symbol of Power + design your own character + meet the team
==============================
Receive a CREATOR PACK, and meet the creators of Prodigy during a memorable stay in Paris during which you will be able to choose any figurine and see it painted live to your taste.
Free shipping.
